Calculate LD

Source: R/LD.R
LD.plink_LD.Rd

Use plink to calculate LD from a vcf.

LD.plink_LD(
  leadSNP = NULL,
  subset_DT,
  bim_path = NULL,
  remove_excess_snps = T,
  merge_by_RSID = F,
  LD_folder,
  min_r2 = F,
  min_Dprime = F,
  remove_correlates = F,
  fillNA = 0,
  plink_prefix = "plink",
  verbose = T,
  conda_env = NULL
)

See also

Other LD: LD.1KG_download_vcf(), LD.1KG(), LD.LD_blocks(), LD.UKBiobank(), LD.calculate_LD(), LD.construct_subset_vcf_name(), LD.custom_panel(), LD.dprime_table(), LD.filter_LD(), LD.filter_vcf_gaston(), LD.filter_vcf(), LD.get_locus_vcf_folder(), LD.index_vcf(), LD.leadSNP_block(), LD.load_or_create(), LD.plink_file(), LD.plot_LD(), LD.query_vcf(), LD.rds_to_npz(), LD.read_bin(), LD.read_ld_table(), LD.run_plink_LD(), LD.save_LD_matrix(), LD.snpstats_get_LD(), LD.snpstats_get_MAF(), LD.translate_population(), LD.vcf_to_bed(), LDlinkR.LDproxy_batch(), popDat_1KGphase1, popDat_1KGphase3, saveSparse()

Examples

locus_dir <- "/sc/arion/projects/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Kunkle_2019/ACE"
LD_folder <- file.path(locus_dir,"LD")
ld.matrix <- LD.plink_LD(subset_DT=BST1, LD_folder=LD_folder)
#> [1] "++ Reading in BIM file..."
#> Error in data.table::fread(bim_path, col.names = c("CHR", "SNP", "V3",     "POS", "A1", "A2"), stringsAsFactors = F): File '/sc/arion/projects/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Kunkle_2019/ACE/LD/plink.bim' does not exist or is non-readable. getwd()=='/Desktop/echoverse/echolocatoR/docs/reference'
